languages.text: "Вы дали мне сил сбросить с души гнет оков, насланных коварством Фелека. Разрушить темницу собственных страхов. И я желаю отплатить вам тем же". {n}Кассия протягивает руку к вашему лбу, останавливаясь на полпути.{/n} "Скинуть с плеч увядающий пурпур этого места. Разорвать удушающе-бурый ошейник... Если, конечно, вы мне позволите".

traits.locale_text: "Вы дали мне сил сбросить с души гнет оков, насланных коварством Фелека. Разрушить темницу собственных страхов. И я желаю отплатить вам тем же". {n}Кассия протягивает руку к вашему лбу, останавливась на полпути.{/n} "Скинуть с плеч увядающий пурпур этого места. Разорвать удушающе-бурый ошейник... Если, конечно, вы мне позволите".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."
languages.original_text: "Вы дали мне сил сбросить с души гнет оков, насланных коварством Фелека. Разрушить темницу собственных страхов. И я желаю отплатить вам тем же". {n}Кассия протягивает руку к вашему лбу, останавливаясь на полпути.{/n} "Скинуть с плеч увядающий пурпур этого места. Разорвать удушающе-бурый ошейник... Если, конечно, вы мне позволите".

traits.locale_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had caught my soul in. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand towards your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To tear up the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你给了我力量，让我摆脱狡猾的费雷克留在我灵魂中的枷锁，帮助我摧垮了我恐惧的囚牢。我希望也能以同样的方式，报答你的恩情。”{n}卡西娅朝你的额头伸出了手，伸到一半停了下来。{/n}“我希望能把这暗紫色的负担从你的肩上卸下，扯开这让你窒息的褐色绳结……当然，前提是你允许我这么做。”
languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

traits.locale_text: “你给了我力量，让我摆脱狡猾的费雷克留在我灵魂中的枷锁，帮助我摧垮了我恐惧的囚牢。我希望也能以同样的方式，报答你的恩情。”{n}卡西娅朝你的额头伸出了手，伸到一半停了下来。{/n}“我希望能把这暗紫色的负担从你的肩上卸下，扯开这让你窒息的褐色绳结……当然，前提是你允许我这么做。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

languages.text: «Me dio las fuerzas para librarme de los grilletes que la astucia de Felek había colocado en torno a mi alma y escapar de la prisión de mis propios miedos. Y quiero recompensarle de igual modo». {n}Cassia alarga la mano hacia tu frente, pero se detiene a medio camino.{/n} «Quiero librarle del púrpura desgastado que este lugar apoya en sus hombros y romper el collar marrón que le ahoga... si me lo permite».
languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

traits.locale_text: «Me dio las fuerzas para librarme de los grilletes que la astucia de Felek había colocado en torno a mi alma y escapar de la prisión de mis propios miedos. Y quiero recompensarle de igual modo». {n}Cassia alarga la mano hacia tu frente, pero se detiene a medio camino.{/n} «Quiero librarle del púrpura desgastado que este lugar apoya en sus hombros y romper el collar marrón que le ahoga... si me lo permite».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは、フェレックによって縛られた足かせを外す力を与えてくれました。自分の恐怖の牢獄を取り壊すための力を。そのお返しをしたいのです」{n}カシアはあなたの額に向かって手を伸ばし、途中で止めた。{/n}「この地の色褪せた紫を、あなたの肩から捨て去るために。あなたの首を絞めている茶色の首輪を壊すために…もちろん、あなたが許してくれればの話ですが」
languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは、フェレックによって縛られた足かせを外す力を与えてくれました。自分の恐怖の牢獄を取り壊すための力を。そのお返しをしたいのです」{n}カシアはあなたの額に向かって手を伸ばし、途中で止めた。{/n}「この地の色褪せた紫を、あなたの肩から捨て去るために。あなたの首を絞めている茶色の首輪を壊すために…もちろん、あなたが許してくれればの話ですが」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir die Kraft gegeben, die Fesseln abzuwerfen, die Feleks List um meine Seele gelegt hatte. Das Gefängnis meiner eigenen Ängste einzureißen. Und ich möchte mich revanchieren." {n}Cassia streckt eine Hand in Richtung deiner Stirn aus, hält aber auf halbem Wege inne.{/n} "Das verblassende Violett dieses Ortes von Euren Schultern fegen. Das braune Halseisen zerschlagen, das Euch erstickt ... Falls Ihr es denn gestatet."
languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir die Kraft gegeben, die Fesseln abzuwerfen, die Feleks List um meine Seele gelegt hatte. Das Gefängnis meiner eigenen Ängste einzureißen. Und ich möchte mich revanchieren." {n}Cassia streckt eine Hand in Richtung deiner Stirn aus, hält aber auf halbem Wege inne.{/n} "Das verblassende Violett dieses Ortes von Euren Schultern fegen. Das braune Halseisen zerschlagen, das Euch erstickt ... Falls Ihr es denn gestatet."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous m'avez donné la force de me libérer des chaînes de Felek qui entravaient mon âme, d'abattre la prison de mes propres peurs, et je souhaite rembourser ma dette. » {n}Cassia tend une main vers votre front, mais s'arrête à mi-chemin.{/n} « Je peux libérer vos épaules du fardeau pourpre de cet endroit, briser le collier brun qui vous étouffe... Si vous m'en donnez la permission, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez donné la force de me libérer des chaînes de Felek qui entravaient mon âme, d'abattre la prison de mes propres peurs, et je souhaite rembourser ma dette. » {n}Cassia tend une main vers votre front, mais s'arrête à mi-chemin.{/n} « Je peux libérer vos épaules du fardeau pourpre de cet endroit, briser le collier brun qui vous étouffe... Si vous m'en donnez la permission, bien sûr. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Felek'in ruhuma kurnazca vurduğu prangalardan kurtulmamı sağlayacak kuvveti bana bahşettin. Kendi korkularımdan inşa ettiğim zindanı yıkmamı sağladın. Sana borcumu aynen ödemek niyetindeyim." {n}Cassia bir elini alnına doğru uzatıp yarı yolda duruyor.{/n} "Buradaki solgun morluğun yükünü omuzlarından alayım. Gırtlağını sıkan kararmış tasmayı kırayım... Tabii eğer iznin varsa."
languages.original_text: "You gave me the strength to cast off the shackles that Felek's cunning had closed around my soul. To tear down the prison of my own fears. And I wish to repay you in kind." {n}Cassia extends a hand toward your forehead, stopping halfway.{/n} "To cast the fading purple of this place from your shoulders. To break the brown collar that is choking you... That is, of course, if you permit me to."

traits.locale_text: "Felek'in kurnazca ruhuma vurduğu prangalardan kurtulmamı sağlayacak kuvveti bana bahşettin. Kendi korkularımdan inşa ettiğim zindanı yıkmamı sağladın. Sana borcumu aynen ödemek niyetindeyim." {n}Cassia bir elini alnına doğru uzatıyor ama yarı yolda duruyor.{/n} "Buradaki solgun morluğun yükünü omuzlarından alayım. Gırtlağını sıkan kararmış tasmayı kırayım... Tabii eğer iznin varsa."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
